article: william morrison supermarkets plc said thursday that chairman ken morrison , criticized by investors for the company 's takeover of safeway plc and a subsequent slide in earnings and share price , has stepped down from the day-to-day running of the company .
abstract: morrison supermarkets chairman steps aside after criticism of rival takeover
